amendment.description: To provide for the consideration of resilient construction techniques in certain studies relating to extreme weather events.

vote.text: Amendment SA 800 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 800 proposed by Senator Boxer for Senator Blunt.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 800 proposed by Senator Boxer for Senator Blunt.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 800 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
